user_request: I want to filter out texts with very inconsistent or chaotic line structure. Lines should stay within a reasonable range, not extremely short fragments mixed with extremely long lines.
I need texts where line lengths are fairly consistent. The variation should be controlled so lines feel uniform enough for normal reading without jarring length changes.
I need texts where most lines fall in the 150 to 250 character range. This ensures a very narrow and predictable line length distribution across the document.
I want to filter out texts where individual lines exceed 1500 characters. Some longer lines for URLs or code blocks are acceptable as long as they don't exceed this threshold.
I need texts where the longest line stays under 800 characters. This prevents any single line from becoming too long or unwieldy to process normally.
I need texts where the longest line is between 400 and 600 characters. This creates a tight constraint on individual line length for systems with specific line length requirements.
I want to exclude very short fragments that are incomplete. Documents should be at least 100 characters and can go up to 50000 without issue.
I need documents between 1000 and 20000 characters in length. This targets well formed documents that are complete but not excessively long.
I need documents that fall between 2000 and 15000 characters. This narrows the range to ensure documents are substantial and properly developed.
I want to stay within the range that modern language models can handle. Content should be processable without hitting context limits.
I need texts that use between 100 and 2048 tokens. This balances having enough context for meaningful understanding while keeping processing time reasonable.
I need texts with token counts between 200 and 1024. This ensures efficient inference while guaranteeing enough tokens for substantive processing.
I want to exclude extremely short fragments that lack substance and very verbose texts that are overly long. Content should be somewhere between these extremes.
I need texts that contain between 300 and 1500 words. This targets content that is complete and meaningful without being unnecessarily extensive.
I need texts with word counts in the 500 to 1000 range. This focuses on content that is information dense without excessive padding or brevity.
